entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:10 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
